activities: Telephone number information (without names and addresses attached)related to downloads of games and applications on mobile phones
recoursemech: Cellmania will utilize the European Data Protection Authorities for dispute resolution. Cellmania has sent the annual fee of US $50 in order to cover the operating costs of the Data Protection Authorities' panel, payable to the United States Council for International Business (c/o Mr. Paul Cronin, U.S. Council for International Business (USCIB); 1212 Avenue of the Americas; New York, NY 10036), which has agreed to act as trusted third party for this purpose.
